text: The 2019 Banja Luka Challenger was a professional tennis tournament played on clay courts. It was the eighteenth edition of the tournament which was part of the 2019 ATP Challenger Tour. It took place in Banja Luka, Bosnia and Herzegovina from 9 to 15 September 2019. ==Singles main draw entrants== ===Seeds=== {|class="sortable wikitable" |- ! width="70"| Country ! width="175"| Player ! Rank1 ! Seed |- | |Robin Haase |143 |1 |- | |Filippo Baldi |146 |2 |- | |Nikola Milojević |148 |3 |- | |Federico Coria |157 |4 |- | |Filip Horanský |189 |5 |- | |Sumit Nagal |190 |6 |- | |Tallon Griekspoor |194 |7 |- | |Carlos Berlocq |199 |8 |- | |Rogério Dutra Silva |200 |9 |- | |Peđa Krstin |210 |10 |- | |Andrea Collarini |219 |11 |- | |Christopher O'Connell |221 |12 |- | |Dmitry Popko |236 |13 |- | |Alejandro Tabilo |238 |14 |- | |Danilo Petrović |247 |15 |- | |Facundo Mena |266 |16 |} * 1 Rankings are as of 26 August 2019. ===Other Entrants=== The following players received wildcards into the singles main draw: * Filip Krolo * Nemanja Malešević * Nikola Milojević * Matija Pecotić * Goran Radanović The following player received entry into the singles main draw as an alternate: * Jaume Pla Malfeito The following players received entry from the qualifying draw: * Fabien Reboul * Matej Sabanov ==Champions== ===Singles=== * Tallon Griekspoor def. Sumit Nagal 6–2, 6–3. ===Doubles=== * Sadio Doumbia / Fabien Reboul def. Sergio Galdós / Facundo Mena 6–3, 7–6(7–4). ==References== Category:2019 in Bosnia and Herzegovina sport Banja Luka Challenger 2019 Banja Luka Challenger
title: 2019 Banja Luka Challenger
